text: sa'adkhiluh jahnama; kay yaslaa hrraha wayahtariq binaraha wama 'uealimuk ay shay' jahnaman? la tubqi lhmana wala tatrik ezmana 'iilaa 'ahraqatahu, mghyirt lilbasharati, mswwidt liljuludi, muharaqatan laha, yali 'amriha wayatasalat ealaa 'ahliha bialeadhab tset eshr mlkana min alzabaniat al'ashda'
